scripts.safe_bazelisk: if which bazelisk >/dev/null; then bazel_bin=bazelisk; else bazel_bin=bazel; fi && $bazel_bin
scripts.test:debug: npm run compile:local && npm run safe_bazelisk run //polygerrit-ui:karma_bin -- -- start $(pwd)/polygerrit-ui/karma.conf.js --root '.ts-out/polygerrit-ui/app/' --browsers ChromeDev --no-single-run --test-files
scripts.test:single: npm run compile:local && npm run safe_bazelisk run //polygerrit-ui:karma_bin -- -- start $(pwd)/polygerrit-ui/karma.conf.js --root '.ts-out/polygerrit-ui/app/' --test-files
scripts.polylint:dev: rm -rf ./polygerrit-ui/app/tmpl_out && npm run safe_bazelisk build //polygerrit-ui/app:template_test_tar && mkdir ./polygerrit-ui/app/tmpl_out && tar -xf bazel-bin/polygerrit-ui/app/template_test_tar.tar -C ./polygerrit-ui/app/tmpl_out
